public_aria_modal_dangerText: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone
public_aria_modal_deleteText: The deletion you have made is an irreversible process. Do you approve of this action?
public_aria_modal_promptText: Artificial intelligence support will be used for the product. Please check the content of the prompt generated by artificial intelligence
public_aria_modal_receiptText: This page has been prepared as a sample invoice and is for display purposes only. It does not constitute an actual financial transaction or legal document
public_aria_modal_warningSKUText: The SKU, or Stock Keeping Unit, value will be automatically assigned by the system for all your products. The assignment will be 6 characters long and consist of letters and numbers
public_error_desc: Please check the URL in the address bar and try again
public_formElements_commandPalette_helpS: The search part is customized for product and variant search. You can make a product-based search using the first option. If the second option is you can use it for a product variant based search
public_formElements_commandPalette_nothi: No results matching your search were found
public_forms_category_tagErrors_useSmall: ! You can only use alphabetic characters and numbers when creating your category tree
public_forms_category_title: A product category is a taxonomy created to group products with similar characteristics or to organize products offered under a specific theme or category. This can help customers find products more easily when shopping and limit search results
public_forms_fileUpload_title: You can drag and drop file to here...
public_forms_fileUpload_titleHover: Drag and drop files or click to select
public_forms_filters_brand_title: In order for products to be associated or categorized with specific brands, the brands of the products you sell in your shop are needed. This process allows customers to more easily find products from a particular brand and view products that are unique to that brand
public_forms_module_analyticIdDesc: Google Analytics is a unique identifier used to connect your account to your website or mobile app. This ID is used to transfer your website visitor data to your Google Analytics account
public_forms_module_analyticsPropertyId: Google Analytics is the unique identifier of your account to a property (property). This ID is used to connect visitor data of your website or mobile app to your Google Analytics account
public_forms_module_apiKey: It is a unique authentication tool used for access to the services of another app. API switches are usually used to verify and track the identity of the project in an API request
public_forms_module_callbackUrl: It is defined as the URL in which an application or system will redirect after completing a specific process. This URL is often used in authentication processes, payment systems and API integrations
public_forms_module_clientId: It is a unique identifier that is often used to authenticate an application or system
public_forms_module_clientSecret: It is a hidden key used to verify the identity of a client (for example, an application). This key is usually used in conjunction with Client ID and is used to verify the identity of a client together
public_forms_module_tagManagerId: Google Tag Manager (GTM) is a unique identifier of your account. This ID is often referred to as Container ID and allows for links your website or mobile app to Google Tag Manager account
public_forms_orderManagement_orders_titl: You can create a new order for your customers under this section. You can add the products you sell by contacting your customer here. The addition you have made will make your reports more reliable
public_forms_product_desiDesc: For desi calculation, after multiplying the product`s width (cm), length (cm) and height (cm) values by each other, the result must be divided by 3000
public_forms_product_googleCategoryDesc: Choose a matching product from the international product category that matches the categorization you have made. It doesnt have to be exactly the same. Just give the product an approximate category
public_forms_product_gtinDesc: It is a unique number that identifies the manufacturer products internationally (1001234512345)
public_forms_product_imageTab_2_help: Please proceed by adding "," between the image links.
public_forms_product_mediaDesc: Make sure that the images you want to upload are smaller than 1MB and that they are files with JPG, JPEG, PNG or GIF extensions
public_forms_product_skuDesc: It is a unique number that identifies the manufacturer products (ABC-12-34)
public_forms_product_title: It allows you to show customers your products and provide them with the necessary information so that they can buy them
public_forms_product_uploadProductsDesc: Click here to download the sample file
public_forms_product_variantsDesc: Click to add a variant to your product!
public_forms_product_variants_title: By defining a variant(COLOR) for your product, you can later add sub-variants(BLACK, WHITE etc.)
public_forms_settings_changePassword_tex: Update your password associated with your account
public_forms_settings_company_address_ch: Let the delivery address and the bill address be the same
public_forms_settings_company_address_te: You can integrate your shop address through this section. The address information you provide will be used in your contact form, footer, etc. areas. Please check and enter the information you have provided in this section
public_forms_settings_company_agreement_: You can add your contracts in this section so that your e-commerce system clarifies the rights and responsibilities of both you and your users
public_forms_settings_company_blogTitle: With blog posts, you can drive traffic to your online store and turn your visitors into customers. It is the easiest way to increase your brand awareness
public_forms_settings_company_config_add: Add to favorites icon on the product detail page
public_forms_settings_company_config_ass: Automatically configure the stock code for all products and variants
public_forms_settings_company_config_cal: Call me button on the product detail page
public_forms_settings_company_config_cas: The user can place an order. You will be notified of the incoming order by e-mail. You contact the user and handle the collection of your money yourself
public_forms_settings_company_config_cha: If you activate this option, the icon at the bottom left will redirect to the crisp chat provider
If you activate this option, the icon at the bottom left will redirect the user to the contact form
If you activate this option, the icon at the bottom left will redirect to the tawkTo chat provider

It determines the live chat provider that will be displayed in the bottom right corner of your shop and shown to your customers. Depending on your preference, providers with various features are activated
If you activate this option, the icon at the bottom left will redirect to the whatsapp chat provider
public_forms_settings_company_config_com: If you activate this option, your SMS service provider will be NETGSM. This is only valid for domestic services.
Disables SMS services. A notification will not be sent when a customer places an order or a new user registers.
If you activate this option, your SMS service provider will be TWILIO. This is valid internationally.

When important events occur within the system, an SMS service is activated to notify you and the user. The best way to explain this is, for example, when you change the status of an ordered product to "shipped," your customer receives a notification that their order has shipped.
public_forms_settings_company_config_hid: Display a field related to the return period for products
public_forms_settings_company_config_iyz: You use the service provided by the IYZICO provider. You receive payments and pay some commission to your provider
public_forms_settings_company_config_lem: It is an international sales service. Works all over the world. High commission
public_forms_settings_company_config_not: Notify me when the price drops
Notify me when the product is back in stock
public_forms_settings_company_config_ord: Can orders be deleted from the system?
Send a date prefix to the beginning of order numbers
public_forms_settings_company_config_pay: Select your preferred method of receiving payments on your site. Online ordering will always remain active
You use the service provided by the PAYTR provider. You receive payments and pay some commission to your provider
public_forms_settings_company_config_reg: Select the region in which you operate
public_forms_settings_company_config_sel: In descending order by sales volume
public_forms_settings_company_config_tex: By updating a number of settings related to your site from this section, you can apply various advantages to your customers
public_forms_settings_company_general_te: You can edit the general settings of your shop
public_forms_settings_company_seller_shi: Free shipping for orders over a certain amount
You can define your shipping rules here. Shipping fees, free shipping conditions, and the shipping integrations to be used are configured here
No shipping fee is charged to the customer for your products. All your products are shipped at the sale price. No extra fees are charged
A cloud-based shipping integration service where you can find different shipping company alternatives at discounted prices and manage all your shipping needs through a single platform
Our logistics services offer a fast and easy way to send cargo abroad at the most affordable rates and manage your delivery and customs documents
It allows you to specify a standard shipping company and shipping fee. All selected products will be charged to the user based on this standard shipping price
public_forms_settings_company_site_order: You can perform all necessary configurations in this section to manage your orders more efficiently
public_forms_settings_company_site_payme: Cash payment, i.e., online orders, is already active within the system in all circumstances. Other methods are optional and can be chosen
public_forms_settings_company_site_produ: In this section, you can configure the features and behaviors that will be presented to the user on the product detail page. By customizing each option according to your needs, you can enhance the user experience and optimize your sales performance
public_forms_settings_company_theme_flow: The stream feature requires 3 posts to be active. So even if you enable the Blog stream, if you have only 2 blog posts, they will not be displayed on the Homepage
public_forms_settings_company_theme_text: You can edit the content on your homepage or hide the ones you don't like
public_forms_settings_company_translatio: It includes versions of the e-commerce module translated into different languages. It is preferred so that users in different regions can move more easily within your store
public_forms_settings_deleteAccount_text: No longer want to use our service? You can delete your account here. This action is not reversible. All information related to this account will be deleted permanently.
public_forms_settings_personalInfo_text: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.
public_forms_settings_socialInfo_text: You can integrate your business social media links into your corporate website through this panel. The URL links you enter will be automatically added to your Footer tab
public_forms_settings_user_PaymentTitle: You can add by selecting a payment method from this part. The payment methods you have added will be listed as Transfer/EFT in the "Footer" tab
public_forms_settings_user_mailTitle: Primary and Secondary E-mail address are the addresses to be transmitted by the e-mails generated by the system as a result of the transactions
public_forms_settings_user_mailTitleSMTP: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol, refers to the server configuration used to send email. The settings here will be used to send emails. Do not forget to test!
public_forms_shipping_address_title: This allows you to add a recipient or sender address to ship your package. If you do not add a sender address here, your company's address, which is defined in the system, will be used as the sender
public_forms_shipping_onDeliveryPayment: List companies that offer cash on delivery
public_forms_shipping_provider_title: To integrate your own agreement with the system and benefit from features such as viewing all your shipments under one roof and identifying problematic shipments in advance, you can connect by entering the information you received from the Cargo Integration Support Unit in the relevant fields below
public_forms_shipping_shipment_delivered: The package has been delivered to the recipient
public_forms_shipping_shipment_deliveryR: The delivery time for the shipment has changed (wrong branch, etc.)
public_forms_shipping_shipment_informati: The cargo was created in the system
public_forms_shipping_shipment_packageAc: The cargo was received by the sending branch
public_forms_shipping_shipment_packageCa: The order has been cancelled. The reason is stated in the status details
public_forms_shipping_shipment_packageDe: The cargo has left the transfer center
public_forms_shipping_shipment_packageFo: The cargo vehicle was given to the company
public_forms_shipping_shipment_pickupFai: The courier attempted to pick up the delivery but was unsuccessful
public_forms_shipping_shipment_pickupOut: The courier has set off to pick up the delivery
public_forms_shipping_shipment_pickupSch: The shipment is scheduled to be picked up
public_forms_shipping_shipment_title: By creating a shipment, you can check prices from various shipping companies and track your shipment in real time by creating a shipping label. The system automatically identifies the most suitable price and the fastest shipping company for you
public_forms_shipping_template_desiWarni: Please ensure the shipping company measures the package and accurately calculates the volumetric weight (desi) upon delivery. We cannot comment on the exact volumetric weight as we never see the packages. We can only provide an estimated weight
public_forms_shipping_template_title: I don't want to send the dimensions of this package individually; you can add package dimensions from here using a pre-saved package size. Packages up to 30 cubic decimeters are already available in the system. You don't need to add any new ones
public_forms_shipping_webhook_title: We recommend using the webhook.site platform during the development process. Create a webhook with your webhook.site link and then update the activity status of your test post. Our webhook system will provide you with information regarding your order status
public_forms_state_buttonDesc: Please click to update package informations
public_forms_state_desc: In order to provide accurate shipping prices to your customers, please also specify the shipping package dimensions and weight. Otherwise, the shipping cost is not calculated clearly
public_forms_state_title: Package dimensions of the product to be shipped
public_forms_userManagement_question_hea: Adding a question to the product
public_forms_userManagement_question_tit: By selecting your passive users from this section, you can pretend that they have asked questions about the product. The question and answer you have added will be placed in the comment section awaiting approval. Dont forget to confirm these questions later
public_forms_userManagement_reviews_head: Adding a comment to the product
public_forms_userManagement_reviews_titl: From this section, you can select your passive users and comment as if they purchased the product, used it and liked it. The comments you have added will be placed in the comment section awaiting approval. Dont forget to approve these comments later
public_forms_userManagement_user_title:
! If the users role is determined as "ROLE_ADMIN", the user is given full authority and can log in to the admin panel.
! If the users activity status is selected as "PASSIVE", this user cannot log in to your Store online. It is only recorded.
! If the users activity status is selected as "ACTIVE", a password is set for this user and this user can now log in to your store
public_forms_validations_between: Please specify a value within a valid range!
public_forms_validations_fileSize: File size must be lower than 1 MB!
public_forms_validations_fileType2: The image you uploaded must have jpg, jpeg, png or gif extension!
public_forms_validations_imageSize: Profile image size must be lower than 1MB!
public_forms_validations_imageType: Profile image type must be jpeg, jpg, png or gif!
public_forms_validations_noDeleteForMult: Delete for products containing multiple variants should be done through the product editing panel!
public_forms_validations_noDeleteForVari: Variant deletion should be done one by one or all of them!
public_forms_validations_phonePattern: 90xxxxxxxxxx | The phone number must have a country code at the beginning
public_forms_validations_tooManyFiles: You cannot upload more than 5 images at a time
public_forms_validations_variantError: There is an error in the variants you have defined. Please check the variant fields!
public_forms_variant_add_value: To add a new variant, first select a product!
public_forms_variant_emptyValue: To add a variant, you must first have a product with at least 1 variant.
public_forms_variant_title: Create a new option under your product by defining different options of a product (such as color, size, model)
public_notification_message_activationEr: Your account is not active. An e-mail containing the activation code has been sent to the e-mail address you specified when registering!
public_notification_message_deleteError: An error occurred during the deletion process. Please try again later!
public_notification_message_forgetPasswo: Your password reset was not successful!
The code you need to reset your password has been sent to your e-mail address!
public_notification_message_getError: An error occurred during the listing process. Please try again later!
public_notification_message_loginError: Email address or password is incorrect!
public_notification_message_patchError: An error occurred during the update process. Please try again later!
public_notification_message_postError: An error occurred during the save process. Please try again later!
public_notification_message_resetPasswor: There was a problem changing your password. Please start your password change process again!
Your password has been changed successfully. You can log in with your new password!
public_notification_message_tokenExpired: Your login has expired. Please log in again!
public_notification_message_updatePasswo: Your password change was not successful!
Your password change was successful. You can log in with your new password!
public_page_applications_addressTitle: When sending a shipment, you need to select a sender address and a recipient address. You can edit the addresses here and then, from the shipment management section, select the address you want to ship to and generate your barcode. Additionally, orders received through the system are automatically registered here as the recipient address
public_page_applications_brandTitle: A brand of a product is a trade name or symbol designated by the manufacturer or distributor of that product. A brand represents the promotion, identity and quality of a product. A good brand is associated with reliability, quality and prestige among customers and provides customers with important information about the product
public_page_applications_categoryTitle: This process is used to help customers find products more easily, improve the shopping experience and increase sales. E-commerce sites usually contain many products, so it is used to organize and present these products effectively
public_page_applications_filterTitle: The product filter gives users the option to sort or display products by specific features, price ranges, brands, sizes, colors, or other special requirements. In this way, customers can find the products they are looking for faster and make the purchasing decision-making process easier
public_page_applications_productTitle: Product management is a function or process that manages a product lifecycle from start to finish. You can perform product-related operations through this panel
public_page_applications_providerTitle: You can use your own shipping agreements. To do this, you need to obtain the provider service information from the technical support departments of the shipping companies
public_page_applications_shipmentTitle: You can ship by purchasing labels from contracted shipping companies, creating cash-on-delivery shipments, or using your own agreements. To do this, you need to create a shipping order
public_page_applications_templateTitle: By creating shipping templates, you can avoid the hassle of manually entering your shipment dimensions each time through default templates. You can create your template by entering your package dimensions as specified in the request
public_page_applications_variantTitle: It means different options or variations of a product. It is generally used when a product is offered with different features such as size, color, model, material. For example, different sizes (S, M, L) or colors (red, blue, black) of a t-shirt are considered product variants
public_page_applications_webhookTitle: With our webhook system, which allows you to track your shipments in real time, you can manage your order's shipping process as you wish. Whenever the shipping status changes via webhook, a JSON unit is sent to the endpoint via a request. You can process the data to be stored appropriately and relieve yourself of the burden of querying by sending shipping requests whenever possible
public_page_category_desc: You can edit the category name and tree structure
public_page_modules_agreementTitle: Are legal documents that specify the rules and conditions that users on a website must comply with. These agreements clarify the rights and responsibilities of both users and website owners. Users usually have to accept these agreements before they can start using the site
public_page_modules_basitKargoTitle: You can configure Simple Shipping integration settings here. Enter url and apiKey information in this field
public_page_modules_blogTitle: Posters can produce content on various topics in line with their personal interests, professional expertise or experience. There are blogs on many different topics such as fashion, travel, technology, health, recipes, education, personal development
public_page_modules_countryStateCityTitl: You can configure the necessary settings to manage country, city and district information here.Enter url and apiKey information in this field
public_page_modules_facebookTitle: You can configure the Facebook API and authentication settings here. Enter information such as apiKey, clientId, clientSecret and callbackUrl in this field
public_page_modules_geoLocationTitle: You can configure the necessary settings to receive user location information here. Enter apiKey and service provider information in this field
public_page_modules_googleTitle: You can configure Google API and authentication settings here. Enter information such as analyticsId, analyticsPropertyId, tagManagerId, apiKey, clientId, clientSecret and callbackUrl
public_page_modules_iyzicoTitle: You can configure the Iyzico payment system integration settings here. Access information such as lang, url, apiKey and secretKey into this field
public_page_modules_tawkToTitle: You can configure the Tawk.To live support integration settings here.Enter propertyId and widgetId information into this field
public_page_modules_yandexTitle: You can configure Yandex Metrica Id settings here. Enter information such as metricaId in this field
public_page_orderManagement_orderTitle: It is the section where customers can access detailed information about the purchases they make and manage these orders
public_page_orderManagement_orphanCartTi: It is defined by the customer as the case of adding products to the shopping cart and leaving the site before the payment process is completed. That is, the customer has added the products to the cart but has not left without termination of the exchange or has not paid for any other reason
public_page_payment_desc: Through this section, you can organize the channels your customers will pay for
public_page_product_desc: You can edit, add or delete your products
public_page_product_nothingFound: No matches found for your search criteria!
public_page_product_placeholder:
Product descriptions!

This section includes your product description. includes with details. Write a description using the editor. The statement you wrote:

  • It may consist of a single list or
  • Can contain multiple list properties.

It also allows you to highlight certain features of your product:

The most preferred model of 2024!
Turkish Statistical Institute
public_page_product_searchPlaceholder: You can search within the table!
public_page_reports_trafficTitle: Analyze your website's visitor traffic. Detailed data on the number of users, visit duration, page view rates, and traffic sources.
public_page_review_desc: If you set the status of the performed operation to: "PENDING", the operation will be placed in the pending table. If you set it to "APPROVED", the operation will be placed in the approved table and can be read by other users. If set to "REJECTED", the operation is moved to the rejected table
public_page_settings_company_sellerTitle: You can edit the logo, address, etc. settings of your store. You can also specify extra features of your store such as currency, time zone, etc
public_page_settings_company_siteTitle: You can configure the basic settings for your store's operation in this section. You can manage settings related to payment methods, product features, and order processes here
public_page_settings_company_translation: You can add a new language pack or edit your existing one
public_page_settings_user_accountTitle: Part of a number of information about your account is used for personalizing your account
public_page_settings_user_mailTitle: From this part, you can configure the systems email submission settings. The email services will run smoothly after entering the required information
public_page_settings_user_paymentTitle: By defining your account-specific payment method, it offers an environment where users can buy your products more conveniently and relying on you. For example, by entering your IBAN information, you can create an alternative payment method for users who do not want to use credit cards
public_page_shipment_review_desc: Estimated delivery time and satisfaction rate were obtained using a machine learning model trained on metadata from thousands of deliveries. Factors such as delays originating from your branch and weather conditions may affect this time
public_page_userManagement_questionTitle: This is the section where you can answer questions directed to the product or guide users by answering these questions. You can perform operations such as listing, approving, rejecting, replying, etc
public_page_userManagement_reviewTitle: This is the section that allows you to manage the evaluations made for your products. Listing, approving, rejecting, deleting, editing, etc. allows you to improve your interaction with the user
public_page_userManagement_userTitle: The Users section is a section that allows site administrators to manage users on the platform. You can list, add, edit, delete, change roles, etc
public_page_user_desc: !If a login is not made for the password area, the user can log in to the system with the password determined by himself. The password field should only be used when you want to change the users password
public_page_variant_desc: You can edit the variants you added under the product via this panel!
